reviewText:
Product received for free

A Point & Click Adventure Gamehttps://youtu.be/WtJlrRMNZXE
+ The writing seems to be taken straight from  Edgar Allan Poe’s “The pit and the pendulum”, if you like his style of writing along with his dark themes you may really enjoy this.
+ I liked the dark and very dreary environments. Very satanic / metal looking.
+ The ambient sounds add a lot to this gloomy game, it makes you on edge like a horror game although not much is actually going on.

- The gameplay itself is pretty awful and often confusing with no sense of direction or what you are supposed to be doing. Most of the game you are expected to just pace around until at some random point the game decides to advance without you doing much of anything.
- The old English Edger Allen Poe style of writing can be a bit difficult for some to read and understand
- Not a whole lot to do or explore, you mainly just rot inside a cell and read through the thoughts of a man on death row waiting for his death sentence.

~ To be honest, this game would likely have been better suited as a visual novel.

reviewText: Featuring the story of Edgar Allan:  You walk around for 5 min being tortured and starved.  The game ends after that.\n\nI would only consider playing this if it was free.
